official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a national historic landmark theme study on African American history.
short_title: African American History Landmark Theme Study Act

summary.text: African American History Landmark Theme Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to report to the Congress on a national historic landmark theme study on African American history. Requires the Secretary to: (1) identify possible new park units appropriate to the theme of African American history; and (2) prepare a list of the most appropriate sites, including a discussion of the feasibility of their inclusion in the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: African American History Landmark Theme Study Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to prepare a national historic landmark theme study on African American history.
